member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper
member.summary: Utility methods for AssetBundles.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper.CreateEmptyAssetBundle
member.summary: Creates an empty AssetBundle with a randomly generated CAB identifier.
member.returns: The empty asset bundle with a random CAB identifier.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper.CreateEmptyAssetBundleRequest
member.summary: Creates an empty AssetBundle request with a randomly generated CAB identifier.
member.returns: The asset bundle request with a random CAB identifier.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper.LoadFromMemory(System.String,System.Byte[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Convenience method to maintain a name of an asset bundle being loaded through memory for logging purposes.
member.param: Path to the asset bundle being loaded. Only used for logging.
Binary data of the asset bundle being loaded.
Crc of the asset bundle.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper.LoadFromMemoryAsync(System.String,System.Byte[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Convenience method to maintain a name of an asset bundle being loaded through memory for logging purposes.
member.param: Path to the asset bundle being loaded. Only used for logging.
Binary data of the asset bundle being loaded.
Crc of the asset bundle.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleHelper.LoadFromFileWithRandomizedCabIfRequired(System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Loads an asset bundle from a file. If loading fails, randomize the CAB and try again from memory.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadedContext
member.summary: The operation context surrounding the AssetBundleLoaded hook (both asynchronous and synchronous).

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadedContext.GetNormalizedPath
member.summary: Gets a normalized path to the asset bundle that is: * Relative to the current directory * Lower-casing * Uses '\' as separators.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadedContext.Complete(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicate your work is done and if any other hooks to this asset bundle load should be called.
member.param: Indicate if the remaining postfixes should be skipped.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadedContext.DisableRecursion
member.summary: Disables recursive calls if you make an asset/asset bundle load call from within your callback. If you want to prevent recursion this should be called before you load the asset/asset bundle.

member.summary: Gets the parameters of the call.

member.summary: Gets or sets the AssetBundle being loaded.

member.summary: Indicate your work is done and if any other hooks to this asset bundle load should be called.

member.summary: Indicate your work is done and if any other hooks to this asset bundle load should be called.
member.param: Indicate if the remaining prefixes should be skipped.

member.summary: Disables recursive calls if you make an asset/asset bundle load call from within your callback. If you want to prevent recursion this should be called before you load the asset/asset bundle.

member.summary: Gets the parameters of the call.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingContext.Bundle
member.summary: Gets or sets the AssetBundle being loaded.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters
member.summary: Class representing the parameters of the load call.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the loaded path. Only relevant for 'LoadFromFile'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters.Crc
member.summary: Gets or sets the crc. Only relevant for 'LoadFromFile' and 'LoadFromMemory'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset. Only relevant for 'LoadFromFile'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters.Binary
member.summary: Gets or sets the binary data. Only relevant for 'LoadFromMemory'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadingParameters.LoadType
member.summary: Gets the type of call that is loading this asset bundle.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadType
member.summary: Enum representing the different ways an asset bundle may be loaded.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadType.LoadFromFile
member.summary: Indicates that the asset bundle is being loaded through a call to 'LoadFromFile' or 'LoadFromFileAsync'.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetBundleLoadType.LoadFromMemory
member.summary: Indicates that the asset bundle is being loaded through a call to 'LoadFromMemory' or 'LoadFromMemoryAsync'.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext
member.summary: The operation context surrounding the AssetLoaded hook.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.HasReferenceBeenRedirectedBefore(UnityEngine.Object)
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if this resource has already been redirected before.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.GetUniqueFileSystemAssetPath(UnityEngine.Object)
member.summary: Gets a file system path for the specfic asset that should be unique.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.GetAssetBundlePath
member.summary: Gets the original path the asset bundle was loaded with.
member.returns: The unmodified, original path the asset bundle was loaded with.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.GetNormalizedAssetBundlePath
member.summary: Gets the normalized path to the asset bundle that is: * Relative to the current directory * Lower-casing * Uses '\' as separators.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.Complete(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicate your work is done and if any other hooks to this asset/resource load should be called.
member.param: Indicate if any other hooks should be skipped.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.DisableRecursion
member.summary: Disables recursive calls if you make an asset/asset bundle load call from within your callback. If you want to prevent recursion this should be called before you load the asset/asset bundle.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.Parameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters the asset load call was called with.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.Bundle
member.summary: Gets the AssetBundle associated with the loaded assets.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.Assets
member.summary:
Gets the loaded assets. Override individual indices to change the asset reference that will be loaded.
Consider using this if the load type is 'LoadByType' or 'LoadNamedWithSubAssets' and you subscribed with 'OneCallbackPerLoadCall'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedContext.Asset
member.summary: Gets the loaded asset. This is simply equal to the first index of the Assets property, with some additional null guards to prevent NullReferenceExceptions when using it.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedParameters
member.summary: Class representing the parameters of the load call.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedParameters.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the asset being loaded. Will be null if loaded through 'LoadMainAsset' or 'LoadByType'.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedParameters.Type
member.summary: Gets the type that passed to the asset load call.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadedParameters.LoadType
member.summary: Gets the type of call that loaded this asset. If 'LoadByType' or 'LoadNamedWithSubAssets' is specified multiple assets may be returned if subscribed as 'OneCallbackPerLoadCall'.

member.summary: Gets the normalized path to the asset bundle that is: * Relative to the current directory * Lower-casing * Uses '\' as separators.

member.summary: Gets or sets the loaded assets. This is simply equal to the first index of the Assets property, with some additional null guards to prevent NullReferenceExceptions when using it.

member.summary: Class representing the parameters of the load call.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadingParameters.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the asset being loaded. Will be null if loaded through 'LoadMainAsset' or 'LoadByType'.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type that passed to the asset load call.

member.summary: Enum representing the different ways an asset may be loaded.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadType.LoadMainAsset
member.summary: Indicates that this asset has been loaded as the 'mainAsset' in the AssetBundle API.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadType.LoadByType
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading all assets of a specific type in an AssetBundle API.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadType.LoadNamed
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading a specific named asset in the AssetBundle API.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.AssetLoadType.LoadNamedWithSubAssets
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading a specific named asset and all those below it in the AssetBundle API.

member.summary: Gets a globally unique identifier.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.HookBehaviour
member.summary: Enum indicating how the resource redirector should treat the callback.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.HookBehaviour.OneCallbackPerLoadCall
member.summary: Specifies that exactly one callback should be received per call to asset/resource load method.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.HookBehaviour.OneCallbackPerResourceLoaded
member.summary: Specifies that exactly one callback should be received per loaded asset/resources. This means that the 'Asset' property should be used over the 'Assets' property on the context object. Do note that when using this option, if no resources are returned by a load call, no callbacks will be received.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceLoadType
member.summary: Enum representing the different ways a resource may be loaded.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceLoadType.LoadByType
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading all assets of a specific type (below a specific path) in the Resources API.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceLoadType.LoadNamed
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading a single named asset in the Resources API.

member.name: F:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceLoadType.LoadNamedBuiltIn
member.summary: Indicates that this call is loading a single named built-in asset in the Resources API.

member.name: T:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection
member.summary: Entrypoint to the resource redirection API.

member.name: P:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.LogAllLoadedResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool indicating if the resource redirector should log all loaded resources/assets to the console.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the Resource Redirector.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.EnableSyncOverAsyncAssetLoads
member.summary: Enables experimental hooks that allows returning an Asset instead of a Request from async prefix asset load operations.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.DisableRecursionPermanently
member.summary:
Disables all recursive behaviour in the plugin. This means that trying to load an asset using the hooked APIs will not trigger a callback back into the callback chain. This makes setting the correct priorities on callbacks much more important.
This method should not be called lightly. It should not be something a single plugin randomly decides to call, but rather decision for how to use the ResourceRedirection API on a game-wide basis.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.EnableEmulateAssetBundles(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an asset bundle hook that attempts to load asset bundles in the emulation directory over the default asset bundles if they exist.
member.param: Priority of the hook.
The directory to look for the asset bundles in.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.DisableEmulateAssetBundles
member.summary: Disable a previously enabled asset bundle emulation.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.EnableRedirectMissingAssetBundlesToEmptyAssetBundle(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an asset bundle hook that redirects asset bundles loads to an empty asset bundle if the file that is being loaded does not exist.
member.param: Priority of the hook.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.EnableRandomizeCabIfConflict(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables CAB randomization of loaded asset bundles if a conflict is detected.
member.param: Priority of the hook.
Indicates whether to force all asset bundles already in memory to have their CAB randomized regardless of whether there is a conflict.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.DisableRandomizeCabIfConflict
member.summary: Disables CAB randomization if it was previously enabled.

member.name: M:XUnity.ResourceRedirector.ResourceRedirection.DisableRedirectMissingAssetBundlesToEmptyAssetBundle
member.summary: Disable a previously enabled redirect missing asset bundles to empty asset bundle.

member.summary: Register an AssetBundleLoaded hook (postfix to loading an asset bundle).
member.param: The priority of the callback, the higher the sooner it will be called.
The callback.
